content:
Hi all! My name is Joe (he/him). I'm @ joranwei on twitter and @ ranweiler on github.

I run the Seattle Rust Meetup, and work at Microsoft.

I've decided to make const generics my entrypoint into properly contributing to rustc. If anyone has pointers for where to hang out to sync with compiler folks already working on that feature, I'd appreciate it!
I think you can try to have a talk with @varkor @yodal or @oli . You can also go through the issue list: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+label%3AF-const_generics
Welcome! My suggestion would be to find an issue and dig in. If you have questions leave a comment on the issue and/or ping @varkor and I here
@yodal thanks! I'll just grab something with a good repro case and dive in.
@varkor, @yodal, what Zulip stream is most appropriate for const-generics chatter?
anywhere in t-compiler â€“ feel free just to start a new topic
